name: Terato Tamer
description:
The Scarlet Moon has risen once again. Darkness seeps over the land, unleashing the ravaging horrors that lurk within. Everyone else has run for their lives. I, however, have welcomed them with open arms and open legs. I've been waiting for this.

Terato Tamer is a turn-based combat/dating sim where you seduce monsters to get them to stop killing you. Hopefully, with your charm and some lucky rolls of the die, you can survive the night. Originally created for GMTK Jam 2022.

This game features violence, sexual/suggestive dialogue, and mature themes. Please play at your own discretion.
